.

NEW

OTHER
REPORTED NAMES
:
Chone duneri Malmgren 1867
.

REMARKS :
Chone duneri Malmgren, 1867
is restricted to the Arctic Ocean, while all the previous Mediterranean records of that species refer probably to
C. dunerificta (
Tovar-Hernández et al. 2007
)
.

;
2001
; Mikac et al. 2013 .
